biography.value:
Dave Dorman

If a beholder is &Reference[condition=stunned] and brought to the brine pool of an elder brain, the beholder can be converted into a mindwitness. This alters some of its eye rays and transforms four of its eyestalks into tentacles similar to a mind flayer's. The mindwitness is psychically imprinted with devotion to the elder brain and submission to illithid commands.

A mindwitness's primary function is to improve telepathic communication in a mind flayer colony. A creature in telepathic communication with a mindwitness can converse through it to as many as seven other creatures the mindwitness can see, rapidly disseminating commands and other information.

If separated from its illithid masters, a mindwitness seeks out other telepathic creatures to tell it what to do. Mindwitnesses have been known to ally with @creature[flumph||flumphs] and planar beings such as demons, shifting their worldview and alignment to match those of their new masters.

description.value: The mindwitness makes one Bite attack and one Tentacles attack, or it uses Eye Ray three times.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+5]]{+5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 ([[/damage 4d6 + 2 type=piercing]]) damage.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+5]]{+5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 20 ([[/damage 4d8 + 2 type=psychic]]) damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is &Reference[condition=grappled] (escape DC 13), and it must succeed on a [[/save ability=intelligence dc=13]] saving throw or be &Reference[condition=restrained] until this grapple ends.

The mindwitness shoots one magical eye ray at random (roll a [[/r d6]], and reroll if the ray has already been used this turn), choosing one target it can see within 120 feet of it:

  • @UUID[Actor.HvZWkctwOd8et9Dn.Item.HTmbV59Fu2vCbO6d]{1: Aversion Ray}
  • @UUID[Actor.HvZWkctwOd8et9Dn.Item.PH2LPqR2pSm8dhzb]{2: Fear Ray}
  • @UUID[Actor.HvZWkctwOd8et9Dn.Item.fVPSsjt34xPFAalf]{3: Psychic Ray}
  • @UUID[Actor.HvZWkctwOd8et9Dn.Item.vNEIsp0KaOxeuRn0]{4: Slowing Ray}
  • @UUID[Actor.HvZWkctwOd8et9Dn.Item.mF9uxiHFrTxt7mEJ]{5: Stunning Ray}
  • @UUID[Actor.HvZWkctwOd8et9Dn.Item.4pi7K1ZOjYVl7AxL]{6: Telekinetic Ray}

The targeted creature must make a [[/save ability=charisma dc=13]] saving throw. On a failed save, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The targeted creature must succeed on a [[/save ability=wisdom dc=13]] saving throw or be &Reference[condition=frightened] for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
The target must succeed on a [[/save ability=intelligence dc=13]] saving throw or take 27 ([[/damage 6d8 type=psychic]]) damage.

The targeted creature must make a [[/save ability=dexterity dc=13]] saving throw. On a failed save, the target's speed is halved for 1 minute. In addition, the creature can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn but not both. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The targeted creature must succeed on a [[/save ability=constitution dc=13]] saving throw or be &Reference[condition=stunned] for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

If the target is a creature, it must make a [[/save ability=strength dc=13]] saving throw. On a failed save, the mindwitness moves it up to 30 feet in any direction, and it is &Reference[condition=restrained] by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the mindwitness's next turn or until the mindwitness is &Reference[condition=incapacitated].

If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is telekinetically moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The mindwitness can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.
When the mindwitness receives a telepathic message, it can telepathically share that message with up to seven other creatures within 600 feet of it that it can see.
